id, month, evaluatorId, evaluator, operationPostId, operationPost, description, createTime, deletestatus, ifLike, status
mapper.select: select a.id as id , a.month, a.evaluatorId, a.evaluator, a.operationPostId, a.operationPost as operationPost, a.createTime, a.deletestatus, a.ifLike, a.status, b.description as description from check_task_assignment as a ,ly_user as b where evaluatorId = #{evaluatorId} and status = '0' and a.operationPostId = b.id and a.month = #{month}
select count(*) from check_task_assignment where evaluatorId = #{evaluatorId} and status = '0' and month = #{month}

select * from check_task_assignment where operationPostId = #{operationPostId} and month = #{month}
and deletestatus like '%${deletestatus}%'
SELECT SUM(checkResult) FROM check_result where operationPostId = #{operationPostId} and month = ${month} GROUP BY evaluatorId

SELECT b.month as month, b.operationPost as operationPost, sum(a.checkresult) as result FROM check_result a, (SELECT evaluatorId,operationPostId,operationPost,month FROM check_task_assignment where`status`='1' and evaluatorId=#{evaluatorId} and monthId=#{monthId}) b where a.evaluatorId=b.evaluatorId AND a.operationPostId = b.operationPostId AND a.`month` = b.`month` GROUP BY a.operationPostId
select count(*) from check_task_assignment where evaluatorId = #{evaluatorId} and status = '1' and monthId = #{monthId}
